department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Removable forage wagon for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) in Agassiz, BC
description: Supplier will provide and deliver a removable large body forage wagon to the Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, B.C.
full_summary:
Proposal for the Supply and Delivery of a Wide Body Forage Wagon
=================================(
##### Proposal Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires the supply and delivery of a wide body forage wagon to its Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, B.C.

##### Tender Details
* Reference Number: WS3854964554-Doc3857325280
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3854964554
* Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

##### Contact Information
The contracting department for this proposal is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the end-user is Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).

To respond to this proposal, please contact:
Clara Dumay (SPAC/PSPC)
clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: No further contact information is available.

##### Key Informations
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
